content.heading: HTML Layout Elements and Techniques
paragraphs: Websites use multi-column layouts, similar to magazines or newspapers, for organized content display.

content.heading: HTML Layout Elements
paragraphs: <header> - Defines a header for a document or section.
<section> - Represents a thematic section in a document.
<footer> - Defines a footer for a document or section.
<summary> - Acts as a heading for the <details> element.

content.heading: HTML Layout Techniques
paragraphs: Four techniques create multi-column layouts, each with distinct benefits:
CSS Frameworks - Tools like Bootstrap or W3.CSS for rapid layout creation.
CSS Float - Simple but less flexible due to document flow dependency.
CSS Flexbox - Adapts layouts to various screen sizes predictably.
CSS Grid - Grid-based system for layouts without floats or positioning.
